Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: Louis Vigo
Reviews.Content: What the description doesnt tell you is that the cameras are barely 5 inches long and made of a low grade plastic.  However at the price, anyone can afford to just buy new ones if they get messed up by the wind or the sun destroys them.They would probably be better as indoor cameras, esp in a spot where they cannot be reached and therefore discovered to be fake.I dont think close inspection would reveal that they are fake without handling them.  If someone were to handle it in any way they would probably suspect something isnt right.  So in the right spot the camera's would be very convincing.

Reviews.Title: yup, they're fake
Reviews.Author: C. Rochon
Reviews.Content: I mean, they don't exactly look like something you'd expect to see in a heavy-duty security setting, but then again most real security cameras don't look 'real' to me, either.  One nice touch on these is the cable - they actually use a real co-ax cable, so it looks very real (it is real).  Haven't tried the red light, probably won't.

Reviews.Title: They look real
Reviews.Author: gaw in FLA
Reviews.Content: Put these up to deter break-ins. They look real to me and the blinking red light shows up well at night.

Reviews.Title: GOT YOU
Reviews.Author: Bernadette Mitchell "Lady Di"
Reviews.Content: It is surprising how many people are detered if they think they are on camera.  In this society, it is terrible that you can no longer leave the front door unlocked or have chairs on the deck. People don't want to work anymore, they rather take. I work too hard to have someone take my things. I have had so much success at my home, I got these for my vacation place.

Reviews.Title: Needs work
Reviews.Author: M Morris
Reviews.Content: The dummy cameras need "C" size batteries for the blinking red lights. Needs a longer life alternative. Skip the batteries.

Reviews.Title: You Dummy
Reviews.Author: clayhands
Reviews.Content: What you expect from a dummy? One of the cameras had a screw that did not unscrew. So I used 3 screws instead of 4.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Chuck Groszek
Reviews.Content: Great cameras they work fine.  I will probably buy more.Easy to install and look great. They will make people think .

Reviews.Title: It Passes The Quick Eye Test
Reviews.Author: VegasDV
Reviews.Content: I installed this several months ago, and the C battery I installed is still going strong!  If you place this in a well lit area that is within arms reach, I would recommend.  However, we have it high up in a corner, and the untrained eye could not tell whether or not it's actually wired into the wall and/or would assume it's a real security camera.  We took a chance on this based on the really inexpensive pricing, and are very pleased with the results!

Reviews.Title: Simulated cameras
Reviews.Author: jerry
Reviews.Content: This is a great addition to my real cameras, they look very similar to them while I have mixed these cameras amongst the live ones.

Reviews.Title: look real
Reviews.Author: truck man
Reviews.Content: overall happy put 3 of them up the other one the lense was off needs to be glued back on

Reviews.Title: cheap screws stripped
Reviews.Author: Susan "Susan"
Reviews.Content: seller would not replace just the one and required all 4 to be returned.  Had already installed batteries in 3, thenfound those screws had stripped as well so could not get the batteries out.  not cost effective to return. So will keeptil batteries wear and will buy higher quality item and trash these

Reviews.Title: fake cameras
Reviews.Author: Keith E. Greenhalgh "the Redcoat"
Reviews.Content: These cameras came with no instructions, but I didn't need them.  I soon found out how to insert the batteries (C battery) and had them up on the ceiling and flashing in no time. A good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great deterrent
Reviews.Author: William Weed
Reviews.Content: Super quick shipping.  Product as described. Used in a couple closets to keep staff from bickering. Works like a champ. Be careful not t drop as lense not glued on too well.  For the price can't go wrong

Reviews.Title: Look good!
Reviews.Author: Rusty
Reviews.Content: These cameras are a little small but look quite convincing. Love the fact that they come with stickers and a large sign announcing video recording taking place! Each comes with a small piece of coaxial cable which is enough to make them look real in some instances but I will likely use some old cable I have lying around that is longer. The mounts are better than expected for the price. Even comes with mounting hardware. Mixed with a couple of real cameras, these should make my house quite safe.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA for being Fake
Reviews.Author: Carlene
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 of these cameras for our home when we went on vacation for a month..Look awsome and work great. They were still blining when we got home 1 month later....Love them

Reviews.Title: Great price well built metal holders
Reviews.Author: Stephen Connolly "steve"
Reviews.Content: these 4 cameras have a c battery light that works and a cable that hangs off the back--if you tuck the cable into something on the building they look really real For $25 for four this is a DEAL

Reviews.Title: Mounting kits are extremely fragile
Reviews.Author: Mark M. "X111"
Reviews.Content: These are great for mixing in with real cameras.The bad guys would have to get pretty close to know these are fake.The main drawback is the mount. They are extremely fragile.I broke and ruined the first camera mount too easily.

Reviews.Title: i really hate them
Reviews.Author: yalinwyan
Reviews.Content: can't even put them on. gave them to my neighbors, they said the same things, so they ended up in the trash can

Reviews.Title: Good set of fake cameras, looks very real.
Reviews.Author: Bovon
Reviews.Content: 3 stars given only because I ordered the wrong type...these are indoor types, where as I needed outside types. Have put these on a storage shelf for someones future use, and will spend a few extra bucks for the real McCoy, plus professional installation!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Fake Dummy Simulated Security Surveillance Box Camera with Flashing Red LED Light. Metal bracket
Increase your security at a fraction of the cost of real cameras, Staff & thieves will never know it is a dummy
Easy to install, the inexpensive solution to increase your security value
The flashing LED light (Powered by 2 'C' Cell Batteries and Batteries Not Included)
Package including: 4 dummy cameras, 4 of 3x2" Security Warning Signs
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Fake Dummy Simulated Security CCTV Box Cameras with Flashing Red LED Light 1QW
